Title: Private information access through CSRF
Description: A vulnerability in the API can allow an attacker to commit CSRF gaining access to private information.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.2.10, all versions starting from 2.3.0a before 2.3.8, all versions starting from 3.0.0a before 3.0.0.rc4, all versions starting from 2.4.0a before 2.4.5
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 2.2.10 before 2.3.0a, all versions starting from 2.3.8 before 3.0.0a, all versions starting from 3.0.0.rc4, all versions before 2.4.0a, all versions starting from 2.4.5
